_comment: TEMPLATE: ARIA & Accessibility Configuration - Copy this file and rename it to '[viewname]-aria.json'
_description: Configure accessibility features including screen reader announcements, ARIA labels, and keyboard navigation enhancements.
_usage: Enable features appropriate for your table. More announcements = better accessibility but can be verbose.
_tableIdentification: Provide context about what this table contains
tableDescription: Brief description of table content and purpose
_announcements: Control what gets announced to screen readers

_announcementOptions.announceRowCount: Announce total rows after table loads/updates
_announcementOptions.announcePosition: Announce current row/cell position during navigation
_announcementOptions.announceSearch: Announce search results and match count
_announcementOptions.announcePage: Announce page changes and current page number
_announcementOptions.announceLength: Announce when page length (rows per page) changes
_announcementOptions.announceFilter: Announce filter applications and result counts
_announcementOptions.announceCellClick: Announce cell clicks (can be verbose, usually false)

_enhancements: Enable enhanced ARIA attributes on controls

_enhancementOptions.enhanceSearch: Add ARIA labels and descriptions to search input
_enhancementOptions.enhancePagination: Add ARIA labels to pagination controls
_enhancementOptions.enhancePageLength: Add ARIA labels to page length selector
_enhancementOptions.enhanceCells: Add ARIA labels to table cells for better navigation

messages.initialized: Table loaded with {rowCount} rows. Use arrow keys to navigate, enter to select, and question mark for keyboard shortcuts
messages.searchDescription: Enter search terms to filter table rows
messages.pageLengthLabel: Select number of rows to display per page

guidelines: 1.3.1 Info and Relationships - Semantic structure with ARIA
2.4.6 Headings and Labels - Descriptive labels for controls
3.3.2 Labels or Instructions - Clear input labels
4.1.2 Name, Role, Value - Proper ARIA roles and properties

_bestPractices: Always provide meaningful tableLabel and tableDescription
Enable announceRowCount, announcePosition, and announceSort at minimum
Set announceCellClick to false unless table is highly interactive
Enable all enhancements (enhanceSearch, enhancePagination, etc.) for best accessibility
Customize messages to match your data domain (e.g., 'alerts', 'users', 'products')
Test with screen readers (NVDA, JAWS, VoiceOver)
Use {placeholders} in messages for dynamic content
Consider announcement frequency - too many can be overwhelming
Balance verbosity with usability based on user feedback
_testingTools: axe DevTools - Browser extension for accessibility testing

_commonScenarios.searchableTable: Enable search, filter, and data change announcements
_commonScenarios.interactiveTable: Enable selection, cell click, and update announcements
_commonScenarios.complexTable: Enable all announcements and enhancements for power users
